uc:usecase.uc:name: View Transaction History (Consumer)
uc:usecase.uc:goal: Possibility to view all the transactions related to an account.
uc:usecase.uc:stakeholder: Consumer wants to take a look at his/her transactions.
Merchant wants the consumer to be aware of the transaction history.

uc:guarantees.uc:success: Consumer sees a list of his transactions with their state and is able to browse over it.
uc:guarantees.minimal: Consumer is notified about the reason, why the transaction history is not available.

uc:success.uc:step:
Consumer enters the self service/transaction history view carrying the following information:
PI data (including account data) credential .
System checks, if there is an account for the given payment instrument.
System checks, if the credential is valid for that account.

System displays a list of all transactions containing the following data:
timestamp amount currency basket information dispute state link to trigger dispute. .

uc:extension.name: ACCOUNT DOES NOT EXIST
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that account does not exist.

uc:extension.name: INVALID CREDENTIAL
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that he is not allowd to see the transaction view.

uc:extension.name: TECHNICAL ERROR
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Consumer that it was not possible to display transactions.
